text: The Art of Self Defense is a cartoon made by the Walt Disney Company in 1941, featuring Goofy. ==Production== The cartoon was one of the first to feature many replicas of Goofy at one time. The end of the short uses the Tarzan yell on the soundtrack. ==Voice cast== * Goofy: George Johnson * Narrator: John McLeish ==Home media== The short was released on December 2, 2002, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Complete Goofy. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American sports movies Category:Goofy Category:Short movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Art of Self Defense (1941 movie)
